Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the project plan for the character movement styles and animations.
Gather reference materials for character movement styles and animations, using platforms like Pinterest and ArtStation.
Organize gathered reference materials into a shared folder for easy access by team members.
Send an email to @LeadGameDesigner and @3DModeler asking for collaboration ideas on movement styles.
Review feedback received from @LeadGameDesigner and @3DModeler regarding movement styles.
Collaborate with @3DModeler to brainstorm props that enhance gameplay.
Take notes on interesting prop ideas to discuss in a team meeting later.
Wind down by browsing websites related to game design, focusing on trends and innovations.
